Game: Shrek- SuperSlam 2005-10-25T00:00:00-07:00 Shrek SuperSlam is a fighting video game featuring characters from the Shrek series of films. The plot focuses on Shrek and his friends telling the Dronkeys their own stories to put them to sleep, after one of them inadvertently destroys the family's storybook. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/d948d9f2-e64e-451b-9f9c-3b491c0eac63.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/366586c8-fe39-44bf-9a97-1ea256eff7c0.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/c2209820-7891-40da-9f94-cd4e11600ad7.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/388daaa8-073f-4b90-bcf3-834be8b8c9ec.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shrek_SuperSlam Fighting 7 Studios Activision
